Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Skin Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Skin Disorder/Skin Infection/Furunculosis
Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Infection/Skin Diseases, Infectious/Skin Diseases, Bacterial/Staphylococcal Skin Infections/Furunculosis
Record.Description: A persistent skin infection marked by the presence of furuncles, often chronic and recurrent. In humans, the causative agent is various species of STAPHYLOCOCCUS. In salmonid fish (SALMONIDS), the pathogen is AEROMONAS SALMONICIDA.
